body: Claudia, This is a good question and there was previously no good way to rotate the text without baking.  However, I just added a better branching structure to the output of the coutourLabels: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/256acde09e52e14b...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/256acde09e52e14be26ac17fb08a8b591e7ffd3f) This allows you to rotate the text with a few native Grasshopper components like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wEynLvGyhyQ-ClAg1mxr84bWYnv1YS0rt-XhhjCZhR*kfwdgRg-1jBYN2F3VHUUPy-8M1PZtXF*QhSGO8xZRQMpYbZdoC9F9/RotateContourMesh.JPG) I hope this helps, -Chris
